title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Volutes Supporting Upper Shelf, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Volutes Supporting Upper Shelf
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, center of image, numerical notations and illegible inscriptions indicating dimensions; lower left, similar scattered and parially cut-off inscriptions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular sideboard on six tapering legs (5 shown); rounded front corners decorated on neo-classical motifs; flat front has three drawers in two rows; extended back, two columns, and two "L"-shaped volutes  support upper shelf.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Volutes Supporting Upper Shelf, 1900–05. Graphite on thin paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-31.
